title: Nadia Knows Best
description: The bigger the mistake, the more tempting it is ...When Nadia Kinsella meets Jay Tiernan, she's tempted. Of course she is. Stranded together while a snowstorm rages outside ... who would ever know?But Nadia's already been together with Laurie for years--they're practically childhood sweethearts. Okay, so maybe she doesn't get to see much of him these days, but she can' t betray him.Besides, when you belong to a family like the Kinsellas--glamorous grandmother Miriam, feckless mother Leonie, stop--at--nothing sister Clare--well, someone has to exercise a bit of self--control, don't they? I mean, you wouldn' t want to do something that you might later regret...
author: Jill Mansell
